input_text.Prompt:
Walmart Canada has taken down its online photo processing store following a "potential compromise of customer credit card data."

The chain said it was recently informed of the potential breach of its Photocentre website.

"We immediately launched an investigation and will be contacting customers who may be impacted," Walmart said. "At this time, we have no reason to believe that Walmart.ca, Walmart.com or in-store transactions are affected. "

The chain has immediately suspended the photo website and all mobile applications pending an investigation. The chains recommends that anyone concerned by the breach should monitor card transactions closely, and immediately alert the financial institution involved about any unauthorized charges.

The Globe and Mail, citing an unnamed source, says as many as 60,000 people could be impacted.

Generate a summary:
input_text.Response A: Walmart Canada has taken down its online photo processing store following a "potential compromise of customer credit card data". The company has said that it was recently informed of the potential breach of its Photocentre website and is currently investigating the matter. The Globe and Mail has cited an unnamed source saying as many as 60,000 people could be impacted.
input_text.Response B: Walmart Canada has removed its online photo processing service following a potential compromise of customer credit card data. The chain was recently informed of the potential breach of its Photocentre website, and said it immediately launched an investigation and will be contacting customers who may be affected. The company has no reason to believe that Walmart.ca, Walmart.com, or in-store transactions are affected. The chain has suspended the photo website and all mobile applications pending an investigation. Anyone concerned by the breach should monitor card transactions closely and immediately alert the financial institution involved about any unauthorized charges. The Globe and Mail says as many as 60,000 people could be impacted.

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
